title: [FNG-2] Inadequate constraints on Seize Share Mantissa in the protocol
summary: This bug report is about a problem in the CToken.sol file of the protocol. The `protocolSeizeShareMantissa` parameter, which is used for comparing with Compound, can be changed by the admin without any restrictions. This could cause potential risks and imbalances in the protocol's functioning. There are two main concerns with this: overcapitalization and imbalance in collateral seizure. To fix this issue, an upper limit or a reasonable range should be set for the `protocolSeizeShareMantissa` parameter. This bug has been fixed.
